text: This is a comprehensive list of awards and nominations received by Anastacia, an American pop singer-songwriter. She has been active since 1990. She first gained prominence on BET's Comic View, singing Oleta Adams Get Here in 1992 age 24. She has won 78% of her nominations. Besides World Music Awards, Anastacia only got nominations for European ceremonies. {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#ebf5ff;" !Award Show !Category !Recording !Result |-
